description: Try our easy to follow Prawns With Kale & Pomegranate Tabouli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Pescatarian,Christmas,Prawn,Tree nut free,Kale,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Prawns With Kale & Pomegranate Tabouli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine burgul and 1 cup boiling water in a medium bowl. Cover and stand for 20 minutes or until softened.
Meanwhile, shred kale leaves and place in a large bowl with 2 tbs oil. Massage for 3 minutes to soften.
Spoon burgul onto a serving platter. Top with kale, cucumber, pomegranate seeds, herbs and onion, reserving some for garnish.
Whisk remaining oil and lemon juice to combine. Top salad with prawns and reserved herbs and onion. Drizzle with dressing and serve with lemon wedges.
